CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Account_Name__r.BillingStreet), "", Account_Name__r.BillingStreet & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Name__r.BillingCity), "", Account_Name__r.BillingCity & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Name__r.BillingPostalCode), "", Account_Name__r.BillingPostalCode & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Name__r.BillingState), "", Account_Name__r.BillingState & " ") & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Name__r.BillingCountry), "", Account_Name__r.BillingCountry)
CustomField.label: Account Billing Address
